ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: ... definitely ... I get alot of aggro when still just standing. I guess it pisses mobs off when I m healing people. :-D But I take alot more damage if I get
ygData.messageBody:
> Speak for yourself. I hardly EVER get agrro. when I sit. And with KEI I
> hardly ever have to sit! In MY opinion, it is not worth spending a ton of
> money just so I can avoid getting agrro! Maybe it is to you, but
definitely
> not to me!
>
> -= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
>
I get alot of aggro when still just standing. I guess it pisses mobs off
when I'm healing people. :-D
But I take alot more damage if I get hit while sitting. and if I get lag I
click to stand and end up sitting back down and get chain smacked while
sitting.
But I think I'll wait til they make mounts more useful.
luv,
-Su
